A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I hear all the whining from other "fans". Because you guess wrong about what you THINK they should do\, it's bad plot holes? Give me a break. From the moment Poe starts trolling Hux to the new Rebels forming...I was in. It had action\, it had comedy and it was a joy to watch. 

I am a Star Wars nerd through and through...I play the games (KOTOR and SWTOR) and I read the books (Bloodlines\, New Jedi Order and Darth Bane Series).  The fans always wet themselves when something comes out that is different...None of this follows the EU (Now Legends) stories that I love\, but it doesn't make them any less "Star Wars". This is a new story and I get to see a new story...and I loved seeing it and being a part of it. 

Get over yourselves...I wonder how big of fans all the complainers\, really are...
